38 //
39 // Class for purely geometric (position + velocity) state.
40 //
42 
43 #include <fastrack/state/position_velocity.h>
44 
45 #include <ros/ros.h>
46 
47 namespace fastrack {
48 namespace state {
49 
50 // Initialize static configuration space bounds.
51 VectorXd PositionVelocity::lower_ = VectorXd::Zero(ConfigurationDimension());
52 VectorXd PositionVelocity::upper_ = VectorXd::Ones(ConfigurationDimension());
53 
54 // Constructors.
55 PositionVelocity::PositionVelocity(double x, double y, double z,
56  double vx, double vy, double vz)
57  : State(),
58  position_(Vector3d(x, y, z)),
59  velocity_(Vector3d(vx, vy, vz)) {}
60 PositionVelocity::PositionVelocity(const Vector3d& position,
61  const Vector3d& velocity)
62  : State(),
63  position_(position),
64  velocity_(velocity) {}
65 PositionVelocity::PositionVelocity(const fastrack_msgs::State& msg)
66  : State(),
67  position_(Vector3d::Zero()),
68  velocity_(Vector3d::Zero()) {
69  // Check dimensions.
70  if (msg.x.size() == StateDimension()) {
71  position_(0) = msg.x[0];
72  position_(1) = msg.x[1];
73  position_(2) = msg.x[2];
74  velocity_(0) = msg.x[3];
75  velocity_(1) = msg.x[4];
76  velocity_(2) = msg.x[5];
77  } else if (msg.x.size() == ConfigurationDimension()) {
78  position_(0) = msg.x[0];
79  position_(1) = msg.x[1];
80  position_(2) = msg.x[2];
81  } else
82  ROS_ERROR("PositionVelocity: msg dimension is incorrect.");
83 }
84 PositionVelocity::PositionVelocity(const VectorXd& config)
85  : State(),
86  position_(Vector3d::Zero()),
87  velocity_(Vector3d::Zero()) {
88  // Check dimensions.
89  if (config.size() != ConfigurationDimension())
90  throw std::runtime_error("PositionVelocity: incorrect config dimension.");
91 
92  position_(0) = config(0);
93  position_(1) = config(1);
94  position_(2) = config(2);
95 }
96 
97 // Set non-configuration dimensions to match the given config derivative.
98 void PositionVelocity::SetConfigurationDot(const VectorXd& configuration_dot) {
99  if (configuration_dot.size() != ConfigurationDimension())
100  throw std::runtime_error("PositionVelocity: invalid configuration_dot dim.");
101 
102  velocity_(0) = configuration_dot(0);
103  velocity_(1) = configuration_dot(1);
104  velocity_(2) = configuration_dot(2);
105 }
106 
107 // Static function to sample from the configuration space associated
108 // with this state space. Pass in the lower and upper bounds from
109 // which to sample.
110 VectorXd PositionVelocity::Sample() {
111  const size_t kConfigurationSpaceDimension = 3;
112 
113  // Make sure bounds are of the right size.
114  if (lower_.size() != kConfigurationSpaceDimension ||
115  upper_.size() != kConfigurationSpaceDimension) {
116  throw std::runtime_error("PositionVelocity: invalid configuration space bounds.");
117  }
118 
119  // Initialize a uniform random distribution in (0, 1).
120  std::uniform_real_distribution<double> unif(0.0, 1.0);
121 
122  // Generate random sample.
123  VectorXd sample(kConfigurationSpaceDimension);
124  for (size_t ii = 0; ii < kConfigurationSpaceDimension; ii++)
125  sample(ii) = lower_(ii) + (upper_(ii) - lower_(ii)) * unif(rng_);
126 
127  return sample;
128 }
129 
130 // For a given configuration, what are the corresponding positions in
131 // position space that the system occupies.
132 // NOTE! For simplicity, this is a finite set. In future, this could
133 // be generalized to a collection of generic obstacles.
134 std::vector<Vector3d> PositionVelocity::OccupiedPositions() const {
135  return std::vector<Vector3d>({ position_ });
136 }
137 
138 // Set bounds of the configuration space.
139 void PositionVelocity::SetConfigurationBounds(
140  const VectorXd& lower, const VectorXd& upper) {
141  // Catch incorrect dimensions.
142  if (lower.size() != ConfigurationDimension() ||
143  upper.size() != ConfigurationDimension())
144  throw std::runtime_error("PositionVelocity: incorrect bound dimensions.");
145 
146  lower_ = lower;
147  upper_ = upper;
148 }
149 
150 void PositionVelocity::SetConfigurationBounds(
151  const std::vector<double>& lower, const std::vector<double>& upper) {
152  // Catch incorrect dimensions.
153  if (lower.size() != ConfigurationDimension() ||
154  upper.size() != ConfigurationDimension())
155  throw std::runtime_error("PositionVelocity: incorrect bound dimensions.");
156 
157  lower_(0) = lower[0];
158  lower_(1) = lower[1];
159  lower_(2) = lower[2];
160 
161  upper_(0) = upper[0];
162  upper_(1) = upper[1];
163  upper_(2) = upper[2];
164 }
165 
166 // Convert from ROS message. Assume State is [x, y, z, vx, vy, vz] or
167 // configuration only.
168 void PositionVelocity::FromRos(const fastrack_msgs::State::ConstPtr& msg) {
169  if (msg->x.size() == 6) {
170  // Message contains full state.
171  position_(0) = msg->x[0];
172  position_(1) = msg->x[1];
173  position_(2) = msg->x[2];
174  velocity_(0) = msg->x[3];
175  velocity_(1) = msg->x[4];
176  velocity_(2) = msg->x[5];
177  } else if (msg->x.size() == 3) {
178  // Message contains configuration only.
179  position_(0) = msg->x[0];
180  position_(1) = msg->x[1];
181  position_(2) = msg->x[2];
182  } else
183  ROS_ERROR("PositionVelocity: msg is neither state nor configuration.");
184 }
185 
186 // Convert to ROS message.
187 fastrack_msgs::State PositionVelocity::ToRos() const {
188  fastrack_msgs::State msg;
189  msg.x.push_back(position_(0));
190  msg.x.push_back(position_(1));
191  msg.x.push_back(position_(2));
192  msg.x.push_back(velocity_(0));
193  msg.x.push_back(velocity_(1));
194  msg.x.push_back(velocity_(2));
195 
196  return msg;
197 }
198 
199 
200 // Get bounds of configuration space.
201 VectorXd PositionVelocity::GetConfigurationLower() { return lower_; }
202 VectorXd PositionVelocity::GetConfigurationUpper() { return upper_; }
203 
204 // Compound assignment operators.
205 PositionVelocity& PositionVelocity::operator+=(const PositionVelocity& rhs) {
206  position_ += rhs.position_;
207  velocity_ += rhs.velocity_;
208  return *this;
209 }
210 
211 PositionVelocity& PositionVelocity::operator-=(const PositionVelocity& rhs) {
212  position_ -= rhs.position_;
213  velocity_ -= rhs.velocity_;
214  return *this;
215 }
216 
217 PositionVelocity& PositionVelocity::operator*=(double s) {
218  position_ *= s;
219  velocity_ *= s;
220  return *this;
221 }
222 
223 PositionVelocity& PositionVelocity::operator/=(double s) {
224  position_ /= s;
225  velocity_ /= s;
226  return *this;
227 }

229 // Binary operators.
230 PositionVelocity operator+(PositionVelocity lhs, const PositionVelocity& rhs) {
231  lhs += rhs;
232  return lhs;
233 }
234 
235 PositionVelocity operator-(PositionVelocity lhs, const PositionVelocity& rhs) {
236  lhs -= rhs;
237  return lhs;

251  lhs /= s;
252  return lhs;

255 PositionVelocity operator/(double s, PositionVelocity rhs) {
256  rhs /= s;
257  return rhs;
